trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Butte
There was one other sighting in Butte on or around March 27th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: did not notice object,while taking pic of sunset
divs: Sighting Detailsi take alot of pics,from my house.this particular one at first,looked like a normal pic.,until something caught my eye in the upper right-hand corner.i have tried and tried to explain this,to no avail.we have a small house without ANY satellite dish.there is NOTHING above our house....i have similiar pics,about in the same position and there is nothing there.i don't know if it was hovering-slowly passing by,or anything.it was just caught on my photo.i also have another ariel object that i sent in a couple of yrs.ago,that was caught on caamera.it is baffling-to say the least.i will include that photo again.no one has ever had any answers for these...
